website_summaries.verdict: This camera stabilizer rig system looks complex, but it's easy to use, while delivering high levels of performance.
pros: Large enough to work with all styles of cameras
Includes both a shoulder mount and a rail system to give the camera stabilizer plenty of versatility
You may even mount the stabilizer to a tripod
Includes a matte box that can help you minimize stray light from affecting your photos and videos
cons: Longevity of this device is questionable

customer_reviews.title: Secure Way to Good Productions
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this rig is amazing, secure and completely adjustable. This is a must for movie makers.
customer_reviews.author: MyLo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoulder rig:)
customer_reviews.text: Excellent shoulder rig. Comfortable to hold for a firm grip with dual handle bars and a padded shoulder place. Well built and fully customizable with the barn doors. I really like how versatile it is. They're really great for shooting in environments where I can't control the lighting and I can adjust each individual door and the matte black does wonders for reflecting. I've used it to shoot a couple of music videos and concerts and haven't had any issues using it. The follow focus system is on point and functional, tight and solid. I feel very comfortable strapping my camera into it. Professional filming set up, enhances my stabilization when filming while moving.
customer_reviews.author: Reinhard Stadelbauer

customer_reviews.title: Great for moving or stationary video work.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: •Sturdy aluminum construction •Great for the price •Able to be set on a tripod Cons: •I question the three hood pieces durability where it snaps on the brackets, there is visual plastic wear, you know where the plastic that is supposed to be black turns greyish when its getting ready to break? Yeah that. Luckily replacements are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: ren0_1ane

customer_reviews.title: Get this thing!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was able to set this up with little to no Instructions. Very sturdy and just what I needed. I was even able to buy a clip that fits on it for a light.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NICE CAMERA RIG TO HELP STEADY VIDEO SHOOTING WITHOUT A TRIPOD
customer_reviews.text: I think this Rig set is helpful for holding the camera steady when shooting video but the shoulder pod needs to be adjusted. The screw for mounting the camera slides easily to the ends and constantly unscrews by itself and could be lost so I added tape on each end so the screw is always in the center. It takes a few minutes to set up unless you always keep the camera mounted but in some instances it's better then carrying a tripod. If you can buy it in the 50 dollar price range it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maestro

customer_reviews.title: Great Upgrade for DSLR Rigs
customer_reviews.text: I've used this unit with my Canon T3i DLSR and Canon XA-10 video cam. Matte box hinges are a bit tricky 1st time out - I was afraid of pushing too hard but with a bit of mojo, the barn doors click right into place. Standard rail mounting and lots of adjustment room As for using it to stabilize camera, it is just OK. In conjunction with camera stabilization, its not bad. Not as good as a gimbled stabilizer. Rig looks like it is sturdy and well built. Wish it came with a case.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Forest

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift for my boyfriend and he loved it
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my boyfriend for Christmas and I gave it to him early because reading the reviews on here where some ppl had lost pieces or was used or smelled like smoke, I wanted to be sure I could return it before the deadline. But everything was there, very easy to assemble. He is in love with it. If your into filming, you'll see this is such a huge piece needed to help with performance during filming. Hes happy. I'm happy. $60. Cant go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Looks and works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is really great for small video projects. It was really easy to put together and having the shoulder brace is great. The shoulder brace allows for longer shooting and really helps with stability. I also like the color.
customer_reviews.author: Devon Richards

customer_reviews.title: Awesome rig!
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy, comfortable, and looks awesome! Worked like a champ at PAX South!
customer_reviews.author: Josh - Scrapyard Films

customer_reviews.title: Great first stabilizer.
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying to get into videography, but my naturally shaky hands have caused noticeable defects in my videos. This item has proved very reliable in both it’s stability and resourcefulness. My videos have since turned out considerably more useable. Item was inexpensive but was by no means cheaply made. Would definitely recommend for a first stabilizer for a beginning videographer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommended but takes getting used to
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this is a great mount. A bit heavy once put altogether. And I will say that the knobs to tighten are tricky to get used to and can get really tight which is nice but at the same time makes it difficult to loosen. I definitely recommend this though.
customer_reviews.author: CassClarkPhotography

customer_reviews.title: Excellent buy
customer_reviews.text: This film rig is an excellent buy. I am extremely happy with it. Item is as pictured, it's light weight on the shoulder, fully adjustable with the handle bars, easy to store and transport, and can be completely taken apart if need be. All parts are metal except for barn doors, which made of sturdy and thick matte plastic and help control light flow. I would highly recommend this rig for any serious cinematographer, this shoulder rig will help you achieve smooth moving shots of your subjects and I have no problem keeping up with them.
customer_reviews.author: Leonard Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for DSLR or smaller cinema cameras.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Packaging was professional. No scratching or missing pieces. Holds my equipment really well. I added a go pro mount and microphone mount to it holds all the weight really well and the metal is light weight but very strong for a heavy camera setup does not feel like it would bend or break. Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Ensign

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The Neewar Camera Movie Video making rig system is exactly what you would expect for the price point in which it's being sold. The equipment is sturdy and can feel cheap with certain parts being plastic but the overall rig is amazing for additional equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Rogër Rojas

customer_reviews.title: Great for budget filmmakers Hands down
customer_reviews.text: Much better than I expected! I am a senior photographer in this industry, and it has taken up a lot of my life! I have seen many products at different prices. Although this one is not the cheapest, it has achieved the best balance in terms of price and quality! This shoulder rig is almost fully adjustable, giving me the most comfortable experience I have during the shoot. The quality is very good and meets industry standard sizes. I think it is suitable for all cameras, no doubt highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Blake

customer_reviews.title: Good Stability Solution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product....the stability is amazing for videos, especially when using extended zoom. Appears to be very well made and durable. First test video show this is a low-cost solution to video stability. Well done, Neewer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Its good, but only for a certain type of shot. I wouldnt reccomend this as your primary stabilizer because its hard to get a whole lot of variety of angles with this. Still good for price though.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Oliver

customer_reviews.title: A nice supplement to a content rig
customer_reviews.text: A good supplement to my growing content creation rig. The configuration allows for many use-cases for a variety of settings. Quality materials feel durable and worth the cost. I would say that assembly and configuration can be a bit cumbersome at times. The thumb nuts are effective but tedious. Maybe some quick-release fasteners would be helpful.
customer_reviews.author: shane-o

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my Canon 80d stable
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Keeps my camera stable. I got some great shots while riding on the back of an ATV, and it was some pretty stable footage. I had to tighten some of the screws out of the box, but no big deal. It also came to me smelling like a mechanical skunk.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Carson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: It’s made very well, but I used my 5D with a 24-105mm and it was heavy. I am 5’2 female, small frame. I found it hard to hold steady or walking because my arms and shoulders started to ache. Other than that, great product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Diane

customer_reviews.title: BE CAREFUL ORDERING USED ITEMS
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item with hope. That’s where I went wrong assuming that this item will help me shoot my short film. My package was missing a couple of items. This was very discouraging, but I learned my lesson.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Would work better with a follow focus.
customer_reviews.text: I need to invest in a follow focus, it will help so I dont shake the camera when reaching for the focus ring on the lens.. took it out and used it a few times. super awesome for the price. I really like the grips they feel solid. all the screws feels solid. would totally recommend. if you add a small amount of warp stabilizer, shoot in slow motion, or have a camera with IS then you will have some super smooth clips!
customer_reviews.author: kelly rangel

customer_reviews.title: Can't believe how nice this is for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's so easy to spend money on production gear. The Lens hood alone on this thing is worth $50 and yet you get strong sturdy rods, clamps, handles. It's a GREAT rig system.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel Hood

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly
customer_reviews.text: Great product, as I own several Neewer products I am a loyal customer. One thing I like to point out is that I am somewhat of a large man my shoulders measure 24" across and the bar for the hand grips in only 10" across so I have to squeeze in a little to hold which gets uncomfortable in a long shoot. Overall it took less than 10 minutes to assemble and works very well. One other thing Neewer please consider space, your screws and locking nuts are in some very tight spaces and for people with large hands it's a challenge Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Lance Gipson

customer_reviews.title: Functional and high quality
customer_reviews.text: This rig takes my camera from an average joe to movie star status! It's so useful and intuitive. The weight of it balances really well on my shoulder and it's comfortable since it's padded so it doesn't hurt or jab me and I get complete control with the gripped handles. My camera sits really well inside on the threaded plating and stays securely put. Barn doors work super well for controlling the lighting. It's super solid when put all together and since all the pieces can be separated it makes for compact takedown for storage and travel. So functional and the price is hard to beat.
customer_reviews.author: ELISEO ROSALES

customer_reviews.title: Professional looking rig!
customer_reviews.text: This rig looks good and is good for the price. However, the shoulder-rest/brace is not very useful, as it doesn't really sit on your shoulder without extra effort or use of a taught sling to keep the camera closer to your body.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Main Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: For the low price this was, I was a bit skeptical, but took the chance. Glad I did. It was super intuitive to put together, didn't have to look at the instructions once. Highly adjustable and fits on a tripod perfectly for easy dismounting for on the go filming.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Connor

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny! Wish I would have bought it years ago!
customer_reviews.text: I was really surprised with the quality of this rig! My only complaint is that the handles and the shoulder rest are close together and it feels a little uncomfortable for shooting lengthy shots but other than that, which isn't a big deal, it's PERFECT!
customer_reviews.author: Eric Palmer

customer_reviews.title: It's good, have to make sure you tighten it until ...
customer_reviews.text: It's good, have to make sure you tighten it until it doesnt move anymore, i use a small rubber hammer to tighten the screw tips so it doesn't move at all. I guess you can tighten them by hand but when you are changing and adding, a small rubber hammer will help make it easy to tighten that last needed bit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: When this kit arrived I was so excited until I mounted my camera. as you can see in the picture I provided my Lumix FZ300 sets to the lift of the glair guards. Customer service asked for a picture and this is one of several that I have sent them and now they want a video of the setup. To make a long story short Customer service sucks.
customer_reviews.author: Delvan A Gilbreath

customer_reviews.title: EASY setup
customer_reviews.text: STUPID easy to set up! Love the versatility of all the adjustments! Super quality!
customer_reviews.author: Claus R. Martel

customer_reviews.title: It makes the difference
customer_reviews.text: It took me all of 1 weekend of filming on my DSLR before I realized I needed one of these rigs. I thought myself a fairly steady person but turns out I was wrong. This shoulder rig makes a world of difference. It is designed to be a great labour saver that makes filming while walking around way more steady and you can focus with just one hand. My project went from being a hot mess to actually looking professional all thanks to this item.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy

customer_reviews.title: didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: couldn't get the balance right. Instructions didn't help. Had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Janai Ott

customer_reviews.title: While it is indeed a good contraption, it is somewhat cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: While it is indeed a good contraption, it is somewhat cheaply made. Having said that, for the price, it is a good deal and surely will get the job done. I would still recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr.Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Does its job well, some of the bolts/screw in portions are slightly loose and wobbly. Overall fir the price it creates nice stable images.
customer_reviews.author: TOOF

customer_reviews.title: Functional
customer_reviews.text: I was worried about the quality when read some low score reviews but finally still decided to order it. Well, the result turns to be very good, I have to say it's excellent product with great quality especially considering the price. The shoulder mount fits my shoulder shape well but maybe the padding could be more comfortable for long time use but overall it does what it's supposed to. A very useful piece of equipment and I would recommend for any film maker.
customer_reviews.author: Datrick Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous device. Worked great for a Canon DSLR. Highly adjustable, and gives a very steady picture or footage.
customer_reviews.author: Peter R.

customer_reviews.title: great costumer service
customer_reviews.text: great costumer service! my product was missing the matte box and the seller ended up refunding the difference it works well, lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.author: Joan Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: For the price totally worth it, It helps you to making your camera rig a put some accesories like monitor, also hels you with stability, obviously not like a gimbal but it helps.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo

customer_reviews.title: good product just takes time
customer_reviews.text: Its price is incredible! I just didn't buy anything on Amazon in less than a year,and SO unbelievable that these well-made, technically photographic equipment being SO cheap! Waiting for it with expectations, delivery was fast (this is much better than before). It took some time to assemble, especially to adjust it to the most comfortable setting for me and my camera. The quality is really great, I have fallen in love with it!
customer_reviews.author: Arvin Catarroja

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: A screw lost its thread without even trying hard. They seem to be cheap
customer_reviews.author: Mayuyo

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This rig is sturdy and makes me look somewhat professional while I’m out filming bands in South Central, so five stars for that alone. It’s all very easy to put together and fits nicely onto my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Really handy!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, and it will definitely surprise you as well! Seriously, don't be scared by so many accessories, in fact, the assembly is very simple. Putting it on the shoulder is the best way. According to my personal experience, there is no more labor-saving and stable setting than this. Don't be scared by its bulk too, it's lighter than the rigs I've used ever. I believe in its quality!
customer_reviews.author: Jose L Novas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Tool
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, meet my expectations! Will recommend to any movie makers!
customer_reviews.author: Amazing Gabriel

customer_reviews.title: and he can be pretty critical. I call it a win
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my son who is getting into film making. He was very excited to get it together and put it to use... and he can be pretty critical. I call it a win.
customer_reviews.author: MA Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Threw it away
customer_reviews.text: I should have returned the product right away. Instead I kept it too long and ended up throwing it away on the first shoot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product ended up returning it.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time nor money. Buy a real stabilizer that actually connects to the person. With this one there is no telling if the picture is stable. Don't waste money on this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Jon P.

customer_reviews.title: economical and practical!
customer_reviews.text: Got a very good product at a very low price, a cost-effective microfilm production equipment. It's not very, very light material, but it's a very textured and secure range. The shoulder rest is very soft, so it is very labor-saving in the harmonious cooperation of the arms and shoulder. The best experience for installing a camera, and if with the pro video camera will be too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: james mckinneh

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Amazing rig for filming. Sits comfortably on my shoulder and it's easy to move around with and control with the two handles. Allows me to get a good grip since the texture prevents slipping. Adjustable railing and barn doors for better control of my camera and the lighting let it into it.
customer_reviews.author: Vazquez

customer_reviews.title: Will buy it again
customer_reviews.text: I have used it for about 2 months (probably 10 times). This is a good stabilizer for walking while shooting, and at a very good price. In addition to the focus knob and gear (plastic), the follow-focus unit itself is made of aluminum. Overall, it is very sturdy, but most of the accessories are flexible (can be set or adjusted according to individual needs).
customer_reviews.author: james pick

customer_reviews.title: For the money great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very happy worked great was able to get some great shots and footage.
customer_reviews.author: michael kelly

customer_reviews.title: A little bulky but love it!
customer_reviews.text: Its a little bulky if you're new to this, however its super helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Jadon Ellis

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to set up and arrange
customer_reviews.text: Does the job well. I have used this on multiple video shoots successfully. It is easy to set up and arrange. Quite impressed.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this with my G85 and it works great. A great price for a strong, usable rig.
customer_reviews.author: George T McDonnell

customer_reviews.title: Only you've tried this!
customer_reviews.text: It's like a machine-gun on your shoulder, 100% hit rate to achieve the effect you want! I like to use it to shoot some difficult videos, because it always helps me make my work easier and still fun. This shoulder rig is perfect, making me feel very comfortable while being efficient. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: kenric espinet, jr.

customer_reviews.title: Not made cheap.  Reliable material.
customer_reviews.text: Very durable and well constructed. A little uncomfortable when using a heavy camera, but bearable. I would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Camera mount breaks easily and is exteremly hard to find replacement
customer_reviews.text: Not made made for durability. Shoulder rest needs seriously resigned. Camera mount breaks easily and is exteremly hard to find replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Graham

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic rig!
customer_reviews.text: This rig was so much more than I was anticipating. It was easy to put together, very light, and stabilizes the footage better than I expected given the price. It is a must have for any amateur filmmaker
customer_reviews.author: michael sublett

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. If you know how to shoot already this will make your steady shot that much better.
customer_reviews.author: Philip F.

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing stabilizer! I get awesome footage that's stable when I'm walking around. Allows me to follow and focus with my shot with quickness and stability. The balance is absolutely incredible and it's supportive with the padded shoulder and textured hand grips.
customer_reviews.author: Baron

customer_reviews.title: Very useful for more stable shots, eliminate most camera shake
customer_reviews.text: Makes shooting scenes more stable. Looks very professional and feels the same.
customer_reviews.author: William Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Good product but disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Whoever had this before me should have let it air out before they returned it. It smells like a smoker had it. It’s awful. I should be refunded a percentage since I paid full price for something that has clearly been used.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: This is an excellent product. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I read the 1 star reviews and was worries but still bought it. This is an excellent product. Great quality. Excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: David Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: A friend recommend me this to replace a broken one. Haven't using any equipment of this brand before, I wasn’t expecting much, but it’s been 6 months and I'm still using it every day. Durable, strong, provides all the support I need. No tilt on my camera or any stability problems. A great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Leisha Mace

customer_reviews.title: Did not come with correct parts
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with correct parts to assemble product. Had issues returning and lost out on $80.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla Boettcher

customer_reviews.title: says the quality is amazing, better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift. The person LOVES it, says the quality is amazing, better than expected, and very versatile.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Scott

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price
customer_reviews.text: Although it was easy to put together eventually that meant not much stability while using it, also it would have been nice there was a different design for the shoulder maybe a strap?
customer_reviews.author: Jamilah

customer_reviews.title: Bang for buck
customer_reviews.text: It's not the best but you get what you pay for. I'm very content with it because I wasn't looking to get something expensive.
customer_reviews.author: Jackson Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: It's easier to overcome than I thought. Generously admit, there is no big deal, I am a rookie and a freshbird. But my interest prompted me to overcome each the difficulty, this is a very enjoyable purchase. You deserve to have it, it is good, well-made yet inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Modesto

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love it. This piece of equipment was exactly what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta M GreenWarren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value for the money. rock steady performance.
customer_reviews.author: Frumpy Pigskin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Rig
customer_reviews.text: Love this Damn thing. It adds a since of professionalism that you want when your doing a short film project. Also helps with getting certain shots.
customer_reviews.author: Mikeel Swan

customer_reviews.title: Get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Overall, for the price and performance, I can’t complain. My two complaints are that the shoulder is a little wobbly and after one use the bolt that attaches the camera has gone missing.
customer_reviews.author: CAB2

customer_reviews.title: Great gear
customer_reviews.text: Its actually a nice product. Very easy to assemble and is definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly Great
customer_reviews.text: This little rig is surprisingly great for the price. I was a little skeptical when purchasing but was pleasantly proved wrong. Neewer has my business for future purchases!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: keep looking.  Spend just a bit more.
customer_reviews.text: Its great quality, but it was not designed with much room or ability to customize like other rigs just above this price point. I wish the shoulder pad rested on top of my shoulder as I find I have to hold the whole thing pressed firmly against my chest rather than letting it support itself atop my shoulder. I find I use it mostly with the shoulder stabilizer detached and the grips flipped upside down. The barn doors are cheap and I don't even use them as they are flimsy. My Neewer Follow focus fit very well. Needs a cold shoe mount for external mics.
customer_reviews.author: Beer is food

customer_reviews.title: Gets weak on you after a few months
customer_reviews.text: Used my Canon EOS RP Don't buy it, it will get weak and start to get loose, meaning your camera will rock back and forth when using it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for mobile use, and feels great
customer_reviews.text: Good size very solid, the grip is on point I love it. The DSLR cams fit very sterdy its worth it
customer_reviews.author: Ju Ju

customer_reviews.title: This one is close but not quite there
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic value and good build, but locking mechanisms don't lock, they squeeze, so I'm constantly tightening after in and out of hot car or temp shift between indoor AC and summer heat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice rig
customer_reviews.text: This thing rig is solid and sturdy. Definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Nueva York Soul

customer_reviews.title: Great Value...
customer_reviews.text: Great upgrade for my dlsr rig. It definitely adds to my professionalism on set and looks cool!!!
customer_reviews.author: Cnote

customer_reviews.title: Works great, easy to adjust
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my son. He uses it for his utube videos. Works great, easy to adjust. Only issue we had to notch the top flap so he could use the mic on his video camera.
customer_reviews.author: DCMusic

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works wonders when we are doing our music videos.Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kemp

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great and does what it should, 4 stars because top barn door got loose with little use
customer_reviews.author: matty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. It is exactly what you'd expect. Very solid
customer_reviews.author: Ednir

customer_reviews.title: Smooth movement but tiring to hold
customer_reviews.text: It works extremely smoothly except that your arms get tired when you hold it too long
customer_reviews.author: Nerd Hud

customer_reviews.title: Easy to work & worth having for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I am still a new owner but so far I am very happy..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have my camera yet to see how it works but I got the package faster than time estimated so overall good !
customer_reviews.author: Devante Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome design and I just put it together and so ...
customer_reviews.text: Yes! Awesome design and I just put it together and so far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Blanca D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: It’s alright.. only used it twice before it broke on me... it’s flimsy and barely could hold my DSLR And attachments. Don’t waste your money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Jaden P

customer_reviews.title: Looking forward to more from amazon
customer_reviews.text: IM so in love with this product I didn't have a huge stabilization problem before it but it add such comfort
customer_reviews.author: Zaikiya Duncan

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for a reasonable price. Would love to have more stabilization but this does the trick for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Paige Piontkowsky

customer_reviews.title: finally got it
customer_reviews.text: I finally got it . Now my videos will look more steady and sharp
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Shoulder pad barely comforts my shoulder. So I use it hand held.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Customer Satisfaction
customer_reviews.text: I like the easy assembly of the system and it was lightweight. It arrived really quickly. I'm very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Came with everything, great quality. A bit front heavy, but it is a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Alex F.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together.
customer_reviews.text: Professional looking, easy to put together and fits well on the shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: luke allen

customer_reviews.title: If your starting up in filming , great for product
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very durable, light weight. Great for beginners/ intermittent. Great for moving shots.
customer_reviews.author: Diego c

customer_reviews.title: The product has a screw that will not screw properly ...
customer_reviews.text: The product has a screw that will not screw properly and the product does not hold the camera up on your should as it should. This was a Christmas Gift for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Delores Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It works if you work it.
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight and durable. I did buy a different matte box than the one that came with but a quality product nonetheless
customer_reviews.author: Damien Beard

product_meta.title: Neewer Camera Movie Video Making Rig System Film-Maker Kit for Canon Nikon Sony and Other DSLR Cameras, DV Camcorders,Includes: Shoulder Mount, Standard 15mm Rail Rod System, Matte Box (Red and Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:RedNote: Camera is not included

Description:

DSLR rig set satisfies your basic need for video recording or film making.

It comes with: Matte box, Rail rod system and a shoulder mount.

Matte Box:

Adjustable top and side flags help you the control of light in your lens.

Get rid of unwanted stray light that will disturb your image.

Height adjustment feature can meet the demand of cameras of different height.

Fits 15mm rail rods. Anti-slip blue knobs to tighten.

15mm Rail Rod System:

A 1/4-inch and a 3/8-inch threaded hole in case you need to set it on a tripod.

Industrial rail rod made of Aluminum alloy.

Comfortable and firm hand grip to ensure easy holding and better stabilization.

Aluminum knobs for long lasting tightening and screwing.

Partially rubber padded mounting plate with 1/4-inch screw to fit most cameras.

Shoulder Mount:

Help alleviate the pressure on your shoulder.

Enhance stabilization when filming.

No matter you're new or veteran in filming, the rig can save so much time and energy for you.

Easy to set up and take with you, this flexible DSLR rig set endeavors to give you a better filming experience.

Specification:

Material: Aluminum, ABS, Plastic

Rail C-to-C Distance: 60mm

Fit Rail Diameter: 15mm

Screw Thread: 1/4-inch

Package Contents:

1 x 15mm Rail Rod System

1 x Shoulder Mount

1 x Matte Box
feature_bullets: Affordable and practical DSLR movie rig include: (1)Shoulder Mount; (1)15mm Rail Rod System; (1)Matte box. Note: Camera is not Included
Ergonomic design gives you easy access for any angle and position adjustment, and also capable with any camera tripod or stands with industry standard: tube diameter 15mm center with distance 60mm
Matte box with adjustable top and side flags help you get rid of unwanted light in your image
Comfortable shoulder mount alleviate the pressure on your shoulder as well as aiding stabilization
Fits most Camcorders and DSLR cameras. Easy to set up and convenient to carry, this flexible DSLR rig set endeavors to give you a better filming experience

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars604 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
